items.title: Chrome Extension UX Improvements
items.description: Based on user feedback: collapsible export panel, expanded full-screen error view, MVP mode toggle to pause linting, severity-based error filtering, and repositionable widget button.

items.title: R1-R14 Lint Rules
items.description: Complete set of 14 production-ready linting rules for n8n workflows, covering rate limiting, error handling, secrets detection, webhook acknowledgment, Retry-After compliance, and more.

items.title: Interactive Visual Linter 2.0
items.description: Next generation of our web interface featuring: 1) URL-based Gist Sharing: share analysis results via private links, 2) Visual Graph: interactive n8n workflow visualization, 3) Real-time Analysis: instant feedback as you edit, 4) Professional Layout: 3-column desktop view with independent scrolling.

items.title: GitHub App Integration
items.description: Full integration with GitHub Check Runs API for automated PR reviews with inline annotations.

items.title: CLI Tool
items.description: Complete command-line interface with scan command, multiple output formats (stylish, JSON, SARIF, JUnit XML, GitHub Actions), config file support, and comprehensive CI/CD integration examples for GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, CircleCI, and Azure Pipelines.

items.title: Chrome Extension with UX/UI 2.0
items.description: Real-time static analysis within the n8n editor featuring: 1) Expanded View mode with keyboard navigation (Escape to close, Ctrl+E toggle), 2) Rule Configuration for enabling/disabling specific rules, 3) First-run Onboarding Guide, 4) Export Results in multiple formats (Text, JSON, CSV, SARIF, JUnit), 5) Rules Warning indicator showing skipped rules.

items.title: Suppression Mechanism
items.description: Allow developers to suppress specific findings with inline comments (flowlint-disable) similar to ESLint.

items.title: R15: Two-Phase Commit Pattern
items.description: Detect and recommend two-phase commit patterns for side effects (payments, emails) to prevent duplicate operations.

items.title: R16: Schedule Concurrency Guards
items.description: Prevent concurrent execution of scheduled workflows when not intended, detecting overlapping cron jobs.

items.title: Provider-Aware Retry Templates
items.description: Intelligent retry configuration suggestions based on API provider rate limits (Stripe, Shopify, Notion, GitHub).

items.title: Plugin System
items.description: Extensible architecture allowing teams to write and share custom lint rules via npm packages.
